name: /ˈpäliSH/
description:
My submission for ICDBWTMAG game jam 2020 !
I made a simple cleaning game since I always figured my games needed more polish and figured this was the best way to make a game with lots of polish.
Simply click on the cleaning item to pick it up and then swipe it over the dirt spot to have the cleaning item do its stuff (some items require more swipe then others).
Clean as many objects as you can before time runs out! Compete with your friends to see who can clean the most virtual objects and be crowned the ultimate polisher!
